desc.p: Defines the type of contract whether FUTURE, OPTIONS or FX-OPTION. FUTURE and OPTION are for information only.

FX-OPTION has to be selected if FX OTC functionality is needed. Any DX.CONTRACT.MASTER with an FX-OPTION enabled Contract Class and exchange as OTC, will be treated as an FX OTC option. For these kind of Contract Masters, the Trade and Delivery currencies can be left open at the Contract level and users can set up different Currency pairs at Trade level by using this single Contract Master.
A NOCHANGE field and will get defaulted to NONE when no values provided.
Product category can be defined separately this multi-valued field defines sold futures contracts. Must exist in category code.
Up to 5 numerical characters – input must exist on CATEGORY application
Product category can be defined separately this multi-valued field defines sold put options. Must exist in category code.
Up to 5 numerical characters – input must exist on CATEGORY application
Product category can be defined separately this multi-valued field defines brought put options. Must exist in category code.
Up to 5 numerical characters – input must exist on CATEGORY application
Product category can be defined separately this multi-valued field defines sold call options. Must exist in category code.
Up to 5 numerical characters – input must exist on CATEGORY application

t.desc:
This field defines whether back to back closeout can happen for the trades covered under this contract class record
Validation Rules:
Valid values are YES and NO
Input can be YES only when B2B.ACTIVE field in DX.PARAMETER is set to YES

desc.p: product category code used for particular derivative. Must exist in category code.
Up to 5 numerical characters – input must exist on CATEGORY application
Up to 35 characters of free format text

Each contract that are planned to trade under derivatives module has to be classified for both margin and commission purposes. This classification is done through DX.CONTRACT.CLASS. The classifications are
BOND, COMMODITY, CURRENCY, EQUITY, STIRS etc. This contract class will be attached to DX.TRADE.
Alphanumerical characters maximum 15 characters. any combination allowed.
Product category can be defined separately this multi-valued field defines brought call options. Must exist in category code.
Up to 5 numerical characters – input must exist on CATEGORY application
Product category can be defined separately this multi-valued field defines brought futures contracts. Must exist in category code.
Up to 5 numerical characters – input must exist on CATEGORY application
